import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { Users } from "../../dummyData.js"; export default function Post({ post }) { const user = Users.filter(u => u.id === 1) return (
u.id === post.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}dsds
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
